      • getSubFactory

        public de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.typehandler.ITypeHandlerFactory getSubFactory()
        Some typehandlers, like SqlCollectionTypeHandler, are storing child objects of those Collections, which are marked as Embedded, as JsonObjects. Thius, for the child processing, another ITypeHandlerFactory is used
        Returns:
        the ITypeHandlerFactory for child objects
